Description: Job DescriptionA Reading Teacher is responsible for teaching reading and comprehensive skills to students at Monglish Academy. (They develop lesson plans, create learning materials, and assess student progress to ensure students meet literacy benchmarks.)Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree, with Fluent and accurate English.
Experience teaching reading and comprehension for kids.
Strong communication and collaboration skills
Ability to create and adapt engaging lesson plans and materials
Familiarity with current literacy research and best practices
Ability to work collaboratively with other teachers and academy administrators.
